history.content:
Hi everyone!
Interested in learning about 3D Modeling & Animation? Passionate about pursuing graphics or want to take your first step into the world of animation? Want to bring your imaginative stories and characters to life? 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3DMA@B is an organization that dedicates itself to building a passionate, supportive, and inclusive graphics community on campus. We host educational workshops, speaker events from people in the industry, fun socials and events for students, and we hope to provide potential connections beyond our campus in the field!
Come to our info session on Friday, February 5th from 7-8 pm PST to learn more!!
[IMPORTANT]: If you are interested in attending, please fill out the following form so we can get the zoom link to you: https://forms.gle/Rq22whXegUQu1rPu9
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Additionally, we have a DECAL course if ya'll need the units: UCBUGG!
Students will collaborate in teams to create a short film that they will present at a screening at the end of the semester! Woo!!
To attend the info session (on either Tuesday Jan 26 or Thursday Jan 28), fill out the application linked here!
---------------------------------------------------------------------
Here's the link to our socials! Feel free to connect with us!
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/3dma_at_berkeley/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/3DMAB
Website: http://www.ucbugg.com/static/index.html
Email: 3dma.at.berkeley@gmail.com
history.subject: 3D Modeling and Animation (3DMA) and UCBUGG Infosessions are coming up!!!
